module.name: obstacleDetector
module.description: This module detects obstacles using data coming from the robot's laser.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This moudule aims at detecting obstacles along the robot's path using data coming from the laser. If an obstacle is found, the robot stops navigating.

param.desc: Name of the robot to read laser data from.
Minimum distance between laser points to cluster them (m).
Distance from the obstacle to stop the navigation (m).
Minimum number of points the cluster can include to be considered valid.
